Entry.JapaneseText: リアラ
Entry.EnglishText: Reala

Entry.JapaneseText: ティア
Entry.EnglishText: Tear

Entry.JapaneseText: リオン
Entry.EnglishText: Leon

Entry.JapaneseText: カイル
Entry.EnglishText: Kyle

Entry.JapaneseText: バルバトスに会った…ですって？
Entry.EnglishText: You met Barbatos... you said?

Entry.JapaneseText: ええ。 そう名乗ってたわ
Entry.EnglishText: Yes. That's what he introduced himself as.

Entry.JapaneseText: 知っているのか？
Entry.EnglishText: Do you know him?

Entry.JapaneseText: うん。 元いた世界で…、ちょっとね
Entry.EnglishText: Yeah. From the world I used to live in... kind of.

Entry.JapaneseText: 追ってきたの？
Entry.EnglishText: Did he follow you?

Entry.JapaneseText: 勝ったの？
Entry.EnglishText: Did you win?

Entry.JapaneseText: …ううん、それはないと思う。 恐らく…、これも偶然 「同じ名前のよく似た人」なんでしょうね
Entry.EnglishText: ...No, I don't think so. Probably... it's just another coincidence, "a person with a similar name."

Entry.JapaneseText: 勝ったというか…、 とりあえず凌げた程度かしら
Entry.EnglishText: I wouldn't say "won"... more like I managed to get through, for now.

Entry.JapaneseText: よく事情はわからないが、 あいつは常軌を逸している
Entry.EnglishText: I don't really know the details, but he's quite eccentric.

Entry.JapaneseText: ええ、もう二度と会いたくないわね
Entry.EnglishText: Yes, I never want to see him again.

Entry.JapaneseText: …ここでもあいつに 悩まされるのか
Entry.EnglishText: ...Are we going to be troubled by him here too?

Entry.JapaneseText: …わたし達の知るバルバトスなのかは わからないけれど、これも因縁だわ
Entry.EnglishText: ...I don't know if it's the same Barbatos we know, but it seems like fate.

Entry.JapaneseText: そうだね！
Entry.EnglishText: Yeah!

Entry.JapaneseText: よし、オレ、アイツを倒す！ 本当の英雄なら、 こんな事でへこたれないもんね！
Entry.EnglishText: Alright, I'll defeat him! A real hero wouldn't be deterred by something like this!

Entry.JapaneseText: ふん、軽々しく英雄を名乗るな
Entry.EnglishText: Hmph, don't casually claim to be a hero.

Entry.JapaneseText: …いえ、カイルは英雄よ。 わたしだけの…
Entry.EnglishText: ...No, Kyle is a hero. To me, at least...

Entry.JapaneseText: 何か言った？ リアラ
Entry.EnglishText: Did you say something, Reala?

Entry.JapaneseText: ううん、独り言よ
Entry.EnglishText: No, just talking to myself.
